text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int i , n , a [ 500000 ] = { 0 } ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; int min = a [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < min ) min = a [ i ] ; } unsigned long long int ans = ( min * ( n - 1 ) ) ; printf ( "%llu\n" , ans ) ; } return 0 ; }
